items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: encryption-p is a lightweight password encryption and decryption library using Node.js crypto and SHA256. It provides secure password hashing with salt and easy password comparison, similar to bcrypt.
items.title: ayanhasnain03/encryption-p: encryption-p is a lightweight password encryption and decryption library using Node.js crypto and SHA256. It provides secure password hashing with salt and easy password comparison, similar to bcrypt.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
